messages.subject: Miburo - Shinsetsu Shinsengumi
messages.msgSnippet: Uploaded in the Photos section some scans of a manga called Shinsetsu Shinsengumi (original title: Miburo ). This is the famous(?) manga featuring Serizawa
messages.messageBody:
Uploaded in the Photos section some scans of a manga
called Shinsetsu Shinsengumi (original title:
"Miburo").

This is the famous(?) manga featuring Serizawa Kamo
(no, not me :P), used by Watsuki Nobuhiro as a model
for Jin-eh. As you can see, it's fairly obvious. :D

The manga itself, although FAR from the real facts, is
very good, IMHO.


Serizawa Kamo
